verses.verse: "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> in <S%G2179>Ephesus<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "He who <S%G2902>holds<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> he who <S%G4043>walks<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

"I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2873>toil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G941>tolerate<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2532>men,<s%> and have <S%G3985>tested<s%> those who <S%G5335>call<s%> <S%G1511>themselves<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5571>false.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> You <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G941>endured<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2577>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> grown <S%G2577>weary.<s%>
<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> this <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> that <S%G4675>you<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> you have <S%G1601>fallen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2041>works;<s%> or <S%G4190>else<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G5035>swiftly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2795>move<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3087>lampstand<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3362>unless<s%> you <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3404>hate.<s%>

He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%> To <S%G846>him<s%> who <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3319>the<s%> <S%G3857>Paradise<s%> of my <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> in <S%G4668>Smyrna<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> has come to <S%G2198>life<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

"I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2347>oppression,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> your <S%G4432>poverty<s%> <S%G1161>(but<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%>), <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1438>they<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1438>they<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> are a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan.<s%>

<S%G3367>Don't<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G906>throw<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may be <S%G3985>tested;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>you<s%> will <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>oppression<s%> for <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> Be <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%> He who <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> <S%G91><s%> <S%G3364>won't<s%> be <S%G91>harmed<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4010>Pergamum<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G4501>the<s%> <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1366>two-edged<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

"I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> you <S%G2730>dwell,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>'s <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2532>is.<s%> You hold <S%G2902>firmly<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>of<s%> <S%G493>Antipas<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3739>one,<s%> who was <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2730>dwells.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a few <S%G3641>things<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> some who <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G904>Balak<s%> to throw a stumbling <S%G4625>block<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to commit sexual <S%G4203>immorality.<s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> some who <S%G2902>hold<s%> to the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3404>likewise.<s%>

<S%G3340>Repent<s%> <S%G1487>therefore,<s%> or <S%G3361>else<s%> <S%G1161><s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4501>sword<s%> <S%G4750>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%> To <S%G846>him<s%> who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G3131>manna,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5586>stone,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5586>stone<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he who receives <S%G2983>it.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> "The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> burnished <S%G5474>brass,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> these <S%G3592>things:<s%>

"I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1248>service,<s%> patient <S%G5281>endurance,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> are <S%G4119>more<s%> than the <S%G4413>first.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3641>this<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G1439>tolerate<s%> your <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2403>Jezebel,<s%> who <S%G3004>calls<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess.<s%> She <S%G1321>teaches<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4105>seduces<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to commit sexual <S%G4203>immorality,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3340>repent,<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> she <S%G3756>refuses<s%> to <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2825>bed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>oppression,<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G2288>Death,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> will <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> he who <S%G2045>searches<s%> the <S%G3510>minds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2588>hearts.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>to<s%> each one <S%G1538>of<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> who are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> what some <S%G899>call<s%> 'the deep things of <S%G4567>Satan,<s%>' to <S%G5209>you<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> I am not <S%G906>putting<s%> <S%G3756>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G922>burden<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
<S%G4133>Nevertheless,<s%> hold that <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2902>firmly<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>until<s%> I <S%G2240>come.<s%>

He who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he who <S%G5083>keeps<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> the <S%G5056>end,<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He will <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron,<s%> <S%G4937>shattering<s%> them <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G2764>clay<s%> <S%G4632>pots;<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> also have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father:<s%>
<S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G792>the<s%> <S%G4407>morning<s%> <S%G792>star.<s%>
He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>assemblies.<s%>"
